## Description {#details}

A class that wraps the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blake3">BLAKE3</a> algorithm.

Definition at line 38 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/blake3-h">BLAKE3.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### final() {#a006c25a3aced3ec5ff196b8141161592}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;size&#95;t NumBytes = LLVM&#95;BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>void llvm::BLAKE3::final (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a081d38a75bd71be1f6b2db493b46c70e">BLAKE3Result</a>&lt; NumBytes &gt; &amp; Result)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Finalize the hasher and put the result in <code>Result</code>.

This doesn&#39;t modify the hasher itself, and it&#39;s possible to finalize again after adding more input.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/blake3-h/#l00059">59</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/blake3-h">BLAKE3.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### final() {#a1d9661e1a088c345ba2868f46caaf460}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;size&#95;t NumBytes = LLVM&#95;BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>BLAKE3Result&lt; NumBytes &gt; llvm::BLAKE3::final ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Finalize the hasher and return an output of any length, given in bytes.

This doesn&#39;t modify the hasher itself, and it&#39;s possible to finalize again after adding more input.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/blake3-h/#l00067">67</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/blake3-h">BLAKE3.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### result() {#ab6da7d121372343d7fced230ad454f18}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;size&#95;t NumBytes = LLVM&#95;BLAKE3&#95;OUT&#95;LEN&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>BLAKE3Result&lt; NumBytes &gt; llvm::BLAKE3::result ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the current output for the digested data since the last call to <a href="#ac459cabc1efbb1af18f617940113eccb">init()</a>.

Other hash functions distinguish between <code><a href="#ab6da7d121372343d7fced230ad454f18">result()</a></code> and <code><a href="#a1d9661e1a088c345ba2868f46caaf460">final()</a></code>, with <code><a href="#ab6da7d121372343d7fced230ad454f18">result()</a></code> allowing more calls into <code><a href="#ad247de2450380eeba2fab0e794d5e44f">update()</a></code>, but there&#39;s no

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/blake3-h/#l00080">80</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/blake3-h">BLAKE3.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
